mapper.select: SELECT member.member_id AS memberId, member.member_email AS memberEmail, coupon.coupon_name AS couponName, coupon.coupon_valid AS expiryDate FROM coupon AS coupon JOIN coupon_received AS received ON coupon.coupon_id = received.coupon_id JOIN member AS member ON received.member_id = member.member_id WHERE coupon.coupon_valid <= #{targetDate}

SELECT c.coupon_id AS id, c.coupon_name AS name, c.coupon_rate AS rate, e.event_id AS eventId, c.coupon_valid AS validDate FROM coupon c JOIN event e ON c.coupon_id = e.coupon_id WHERE c.coupon_id = #{couponId} AND c.coupon_valid >= NOW()
